name: GTR Drift Simulator
description:
Burn the Wheels!
MANUAL GEAR CONTROL!
Your car under your full control while drifting.

AUTO GEAR CONTROL!
You can choose auto or manual gear from pause menu >Configurations.

RADIO OPTION
You can listen radio when you want!

20 UNIQUE CARS!
Realistic drifting system and high quality car are awaiting. GTR ,M3 GTR, CLA GT, S2000, 206, Ford GT.

4 UNIQUE DRIFT TRACK
Perform Arena, Race track, Highway Endless, Car Parking

BEST EXPERIENCE
Get ready to experience the most unique drifting thrill. Drifting has never been as fun, exciting and intense.

EASY TO USE AND VERY CUSTOMIZABLE!
Unlock setting menu and customize your car behavior with 5 types (Simulator, Racing, Drift, Semi Arcade, Fun).

DIFFERENT GAME MODES
Choose different tuning modes and have fun limitless.

RECORD GAME!
You can record game while playing and watch your best performance.

SLOW MOTION!
with this behavior you can do your best fantastic action with your GTR.

MULTIPLE CAMERA ANGLES!
You can choose from three different point of views: driver's pov, rear pov and basic cinematic angle.

REAL DRIFT SIMULATOR! and RACING GAME!
Don't let the dust settle! Drift, spin, move on two tires, hit the brakes, use nitro!!

*REAL ENGINE AND TURBO SOUND EFFECTS
*MUSIC
*HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS
*REALISTIC CAR BODY
and more
